Class ShipBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.is25am10.model.boards.ShipBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ShipBoard extends Object implements Serializable
This class contains all the layouts of every type of container in the board. It contains batters, astronauts, aliens, boxes and tiles.

    • init

      brown - where to put the brown alien
